content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
In Julia, Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

of calling your function using the text below.

```julia-repl
"My name is Julia. My name is Amit."
```

This should return:

```julia-repl
"My name is\nJulia.\nMy name is\nAmit."
```

"""

function wrap_string(input::AbstractString, text_width::Int=10)::AbstractString
    input = split(input, ' ')
    wrapped = []
    line = ""
    for word in input
        if length(line) + length(word) > text_width && !isempty(line)
            push!(wrapped, line)
            line = ""
        end
        line *= "$word "
    end
    return join(wrapped, '\n') * "\n"
end
